name: Sugar Skull Hat
description:
Sugar Skull Hat

A fantastic hat that will make a great photo prop or welcome home/baby shower gift.

Created from aran and dk yarns in a variety of colours.

Each flower, and the love heart eyes are all individually made and hand sewn on.

Available in sizes
Newborn - Adults


CARE
I recommend hand wash in warm water with mild detergent, press between two towels and lay flat to dry. Re-shape when damp.

Please note
To view all my products visit http://lilydotcrochet.weebly.com
or simply click the " back to site" button in the left hand panel.

name: Jack Skellington Inspired Hat
description:
Jack Skellinton Inspired Hat from Nightmare before Christmas.

This great hat has been one of my most popular items.

A fantastic accessory for those cold winter days that will keep you and your little one warm and snug and at the same time look amazing.

A cool hat for Halloween as well as all year round.

Created from White and Black Aran yarn.

Sizes available

Newborn to Adult

CARE

I recommend hand wash in warm water with mild detergent, press between two towels and lay flat to dry. Re-shape when damp.

Please note
To view all my products go visit http://lilydotcrochet.weebly.com
or simply click the " back to site" button in the left side panel.

name: Incredible Hulk Hat and Cocoon Set
description:
Incredible Hulk Hat and Cocoon Set.

A fantastic photo prop for babies first photo shoot or a great welcome home/baby shower gift.

Created from aran yarn in Black,White, Lichen Green and Purple.

It has two green buttons for the eyes.

Available in sizes

Newborn
0-3mths
3-6mths
6-9mths

CARE
I recommend hand wash in warm water with mild detergent, press between two towels and lay flat to dry. Re-shape when damp.

Please note 
To view all my products including other superhero cocoon sets visit 
http://lilydotcrochet.weebly.com
or simply click on the "back to site" button in Left side panel.

name: Butterfly Hat and Cocoon Set
description:
Butterfly Hat and Cocoon Set

A gorgeous set that will make a lovely welcome home, baby shower gift or a fantastic photo prop for baby's first photo shoot.

Created from aran yarn in Deep rose, Dusky pink, Pale pink and Lilac.
